messages.subject: Re: More kudos for Rue
messages.messageBody:
--- In UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com, "Robyn Coburn"
<dezigna@...> wrote:
>
> I don't *think* anyone has mentioned it, and Rue appears notoriously
>modest
> so may not say so herself, but congratulations to her for her book,
> "Parenting a Free Child" being chosen as Natural Child Project's
>Parenting
> Resource of the Month for February.
>
Hooray for Rue!

--Deb
